category.question: Select the description of the term.

question.title: ad libitum, ad li.
question.answer: At the liberty of the performer

question.title: ben, bene
question.answer: Well (for example, ben marcato: well marked)

category.question: Select the description of the term.

question.title: col, coll', colla, colle
question.answer: with (for example, coll'ottava: with an added octave)

category.question: Select the description of the term.
Select the description of the term.

question.title: ma
question.answer: but (for example, ma non troppo: but not too much)

category.question: Select the description of the term.
Select the description of the term.

question.title: primo, prima
question.answer: First; the upper part of a duet

category.question: Select the description of the term.

question.title: secondo, seconda
question.answer: Second; second or lower part of a duet

question.title: sforzando
question.answer: Sudden strong accent of a single note or chord

category.question: Select the description of the term.

question.title: simile
question.answer: Continue in the same manner as has just been indicated

question.title: tre corde
question.answer: Three strings; release the left pedal (on the piano)

question.title: una corda
question.answer: One string; depress the left pedal (on the piano)
